result.eng: Tell me what you want.
result.ga: Abair liom a bhfuil uait
result.orig: Abair liom a bhfuil uait
result.html: Abair liom a bhfuil uaitTell me what you want.
result.ponchtml: Abair liom a ḃfuil uaitTell me what you want.

result.eng: You might want to improve the design.
result.ga: B'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadh
result.orig: B'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadh
result.html: B'fhiú dhuit feabhas a chur ar an dearadhYou might want to improve the design.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟiú ḋuit feaḃas a ċur ar an dearaḋYou might want to improve the design.

result.eng: What do you want?
result.ga: Cad é atá de dhíth ort
result.orig: Cad é atá de dhíth ort
result.html: Cad é atá de dhíth ortWhat do you want?
result.ponchtml: Cad é atá de ḋíṫ ortWhat do you want?

result.eng: How much money do you want?
result.ga: Cá mhéad airgid atá uait
result.orig: Cá mhéad airgid atá uait
result.html: Cá mhéad airgid atá uaitHow much money do you want?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad airgid atá uaitHow much money do you want?

result.eng: What made you want to learn Irish?
result.ga: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.orig: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.html: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaimWhat made you want to learn Irish?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ṫug ort an Ġaeilge a ḟoġlaimWhat made you want to learn Irish?

result.eng: We want healthy people to give blood.
result.ga: Is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú fola
result.orig: Is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú fola
result.html: Is mian linn go mbeadh daoine sláintiúla ag deonú folaWe want healthy people to give blood.
result.ponchtml: Is mian linn go mbeaḋ daoine sláintiúla ag deonú folaWe want healthy people to give blood.

result.eng: You are not obliged to vote if you don't want to.
result.ga: Níl aon dualgas ort vótáil mura mian leat
result.orig: Níl aon dualgas ort vótáil mura mian leat
result.html: Níl aon dualgas ort vótáil mura mian leatYou are not obliged to vote if you don't want to.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon dualgas ort vótáil mura mian leatYou are not obliged to vote if you don't want to.

result.eng: All they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ga: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.orig: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.html: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ponchtml: Níl uaṫu aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċ ar a gcuid sean-naiṁdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.

result.eng: The children want sweets.
result.ga: Teastaíonn milseáin ó na leanaí
result.orig: Teastaíonn milseáin ó na leanaí
result.html: Teastaíonn milseáin ó na leanaíThe children want sweets.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn milseáin ó na leanaíThe children want sweets.

result.eng: I want to be free.
result.ga: Teastaíonn uaim bheith saor
result.orig: Teastaíonn uaim bheith saor
result.html: Teastaíonn uaim bheith saorI want to be free.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn uaim ḃeiṫ saorI want to be free.

result.eng: I want to go into Galway to see it.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom dul isteach go Gaillimh len é a fheiceáil
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom dul isteach go Gaillimh len é a fheiceáil
result.html: Ba mhaith liom dul isteach go Gaillimh len é a fheiceáilI want to go into Galway to see it.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom dul isteaċ go Gailliṁ len é a ḟeiceáilI want to go into Galway to see it.

result.eng: Do you want to come?
result.ga: An bhfuil sibh ag iarraidh tíocht
result.orig: An bhfuil sibh ag iarraidh tíocht
result.html: An bhfuil sibh ag iarraidh tíochtDo you want to come?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil siḃ ag iarraiḋ tíoċtDo you want to come?

result.eng: I don't want to go, thank you.
result.ga: Níor mhaith liomsa dul ann go raibh maith agat
result.orig: Níor mhaith liomsa dul ann go raibh maith agat
result.html: Níor mhaith liomsa dul ann go raibh maith agatI don't want to go, thank you.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṁaiṫ liomsa dul ann go raiḃ maiṫ agatI don't want to go, thank you.

result.eng: We want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.
result.ga: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis Mór
result.orig: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis Mór
result.html: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil ó Ghaillimh go Ros an Mhíl leis an mbád a fháil go hInis MórWe want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.
result.ponchtml: Táimid ag iarraiḋ bus a ḟáil ó Ġailliṁ go Ros an Ṁíl leis an mbád a ḟáil go hInis MórWe want to get a bus from Galway to Ros an Mhíl to get the boat to Inis Mór.

result.eng: We want to get a bus today, if we can.
result.ga: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil inniu más féidir linn
result.orig: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil inniu más féidir linn
result.html: Táimid ag iarraidh bus a fháil inniu más féidir linnWe want to get a bus today, if we can.
result.ponchtml: Táimid ag iarraiḋ bus a ḟáil inniu más féidir linnWe want to get a bus today, if we can.

result.eng: What do you want to eat this morning?
result.ga: Céard atá uait le n-ithe ar maidin
result.orig: Céard atá uait le n-ithe ar maidin
result.html: Céard atá uait le n-ithe ar maidinWhat do you want to eat this morning?
result.ponchtml: Céard atá uait le n-iṫe ar maidinWhat do you want to eat this morning?

result.eng: I want cornflakes.
result.ga: Calógaí atá uaim
result.orig: Calógaí atá uaim
result.html: Calógaí atá uaimI want cornflakes.
result.ponchtml: Calógaí atá uaimI want cornflakes.

result.eng: Do you want something to drink?
result.ga: An bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ól
result.orig: An bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ól
result.html: An bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ólDo you want something to drink?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ólDo you want something to drink?

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: Laughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ga: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.orig: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.html: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthiLaughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ponchtml: Ag déanaṁ gáire naċ raiḃ a ḟonn uirṫiLaughing even though she didn't want to.

result.eng: What do you want for it?
result.ga: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shon
result.orig: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shon
result.html: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shonWhat do you want for it?
result.ponchtml: Goidé tá a ḋíṫ ort ar a ẛonWhat do you want for it?

result.eng: Why did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ga: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.orig: Cad chuige a raibh tú domh
result.html: Cad chuige a raibh tú domhWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?
result.ponchtml: Cad ċuige a raiḃ tú doṁWhy did you want to talk to me? Why were you looking for me?

result.eng: She will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ga: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.orig: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.html: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ iontas uirṫi cad ċuige a ḃfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ga: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.orig: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.html: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ponchtml: Aċ ní raiḃ cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}

result.eng: He didn't really want to steal.
result.ga: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aige
result.orig: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aige
result.html: Ní raibh rún ar bith gadaíochta aigeHe didn't really want to steal.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ rún ar biṫ gadaíoċta aigeHe didn't really want to steal.
